ioreg_bitfield.name: PARTNUM
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is the BCD part number."

ioreg_bitfield.name: CHIPID0
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is the unique chip ID 0."

ioreg_bitfield.name: CHIPID1
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is the unique chip ID 1.

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: CHIPREV
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is the Chip Revision Number."

ioreg.ioreg_intro: Memory and Core Voltage Supply Source Select Register

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: COREBUCKEN
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield enables and selects the Core Buck as the supply for the low-voltage power domain."

ioreg_bitfield.name: MEMBUCKEN
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield enables and selects the Memory Buck as the supply for the Flash and SRAM power domain."

ioreg.ioreg_intro: Memory and Core Voltage Supply Source Status Register

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: COREBUCKON
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield indicates whether the Core low-voltage domain is supplied from the LDO (0) or the Buck (1)."

ioreg_bitfield.name: MEMBUCKON
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield indicates whether the Memory power domain is supplied from the LDO (0) or the Buck (1)."

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: CCRGTRIM
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield set the CCRG trim."

ioreg_bitfield.name: CCRGPWD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit powers down the CCRG."

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: PWDCVREF

ioreg_bitfield.name: CVREFLADJ

ioreg_bitfield.name: CVREFBTRIM

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: BYPBUCKMEM
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "Memory Buck Bypass."

ioreg_bitfield.name: ENBUCKMEM
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "Memory buck Enable."

ioreg_bitfield.name: SLEEPBUCKANA
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "Analog buck sleep."

ioreg_bitfield.name: ENBUCKCORE
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "Core buck enable."

ioreg_bitfield.name: BYPBUCKCORE
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "Core buck bypassp."

ioreg_bitfield.name: BUCKSWE
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "Buck Register SW Override Enable."

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: BUCKLFCLKSEL
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "Enable/disable hysteresis on core buck converters internal comparators."

ioreg_bitfield.name: HYSTBUCKCORE
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "Enable/disable hysteresis on core buck converters internal comparators."

ioreg_bitfield.name: HYSTBUCKMEM
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "Enable/disable hysteresis on memory buck converters internal comparators."

ioreg_bitfield.name: BMEMTONSEL

ioreg_bitfield.name: BCORETONSEL

ioreg_bitfield.name: LFRCSWE

ioreg.ioreg_intro: ADC Temp Sensor Bandgap Power Control

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: TSPEN
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield enables the Temp Sensor Power when set to 1 if the ADCTSBGSWE bit is set."

ioreg_bitfield.name: ADCPSEN
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield enables the ADC Power Switch on when set to 1 if the ADCTSBGSWE bit is set."

ioreg_bitfield.name: ADCTSBGSWE
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "ADC Temp Sendor Bandgap Software Power Control Enable"

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: BYPCMPRXTAL
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "XTAL Oscillator Bypass Comparator."

ioreg_bitfield.name: FDBKDSBLXTAL
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "XTAL Oscillator Disable Feedback."

ioreg_bitfield.name: TRIMCOREBXTAL
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "XTAL Oscillator Core bias trim bits"

ioreg_bitfield.name: XTALSWE
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "XTAL Software Override Enable."

ioreg.ioreg_intro: Powerdown an SRAM Bank in Deep Sleep mode

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: BANK7PWDINSLEEP
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit forces SRAM Bank 7 to powerdown in deep sleep mode, causing the contents of the bank to be lost."

ioreg_bitfield.name: BANK6PWDINSLEEP
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit forces SRAM Bank 6 to powerdown in deep sleep mode, causing the contents of the bank to be lost."

ioreg_bitfield.name: BANK5PWDINSLEEP
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit forces SRAM Bank 5 to powerdown in deep sleep mode, causing the contents of the bank to be lost."

ioreg_bitfield.name: BANK4PWDINSLEEP
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit forces SRAM Bank 4 to powerdown in deep sleep mode, causing the contents of the bank to be lost."

ioreg_bitfield.name: BANK3PWDINSLEEP
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit forces SRAM Bank 3 to powerdown in deep sleep mode, causing the contents of the bank to be lost."

ioreg_bitfield.name: BANK2PWDINSLEEP
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit forces SRAM Bank 2 to powerdown in deep sleep mode, causing the contents of the bank to be lost."

ioreg_bitfield.name: BANK1PWDINSLEEP
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit forces SRAM Bank 1 to powerdown in deep sleep mode, causing the contents of the bank to be lost."

ioreg_bitfield.name: BANK0PWDINSLEEP
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit forces SRAM Bank 0 to powerdown in deep sleep mode, causing the contents of the bank to be lost."

ioreg.ioreg_intro: Disables individual banks of the SRAM array

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: VDDR7DIS
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit disables SRAM 7 array."

ioreg_bitfield.name: VDDR6DIS
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit disables SRAM 6 array."

ioreg_bitfield.name: VDDR5DIS
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit disables SRAM 5 array."

ioreg_bitfield.name: VDDR4DIS
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit disables SRAM 4 array."

ioreg_bitfield.name: VDDR3DIS
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit disables SRAM 3 array."

ioreg_bitfield.name: VDDR2DIS
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit disables SRAM 2 array."

ioreg_bitfield.name: VDDR1DIS
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit disables SRAM 1 array."

ioreg_bitfield.name: VDDR0DIS
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit disables SRAM 0 array."

ioreg.ioreg_intro: Disables individual banks of the Flash array

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: VDDF1DIS
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit disables Flash 1 instance."

ioreg_bitfield.name: VDDF0DIS
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit disables Flash 0 instance."

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: EXT_HF
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit is the Manufacturing Test EXT_HF External Clock Source Select."

ioreg_bitfield.name: EXT_LF
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit is the Manufacturing Test EXT_LF External Clock Source Select."

ioreg_bitfield.name: EXT_XT
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit is the Manufacturing Test EXT_XT External Clock Source Select."

ioreg_bitfield.name: CLKTEST
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit is the Manufacturing Test ripple counter short circuit control."

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg.ioreg_intro: Manufacturing Test Register 2 : SRAM BIST Control

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: SBISTEN
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield Enables SRAM BIST for SRAM instances."

ioreg.ioreg_intro: Manufacturing Test Register 3 : SRAM BIST Results

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: SBISTERR
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "SRAM BIST pass/fail results for the BIST enabled instances. 1=FAIL, 0=PASS."

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: SBISTEND
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "SRAM BIST sequence completed status for the BIST enabled instances. 1=COMPLETE, 0=IN PROGRESS."

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: PINTEST
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is the Manufacturing Test field for GPIO control."

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: CMPCCRGCAL

ioreg_bitfield.name: CMP2P2

ioreg_bitfield.name: CMP1P8LP

ioreg_bitfield.name: CMP1P8HP

ioreg_bitfield.name: ANAFRC
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "Analog test force, measure."

ioreg_bitfield.name: ANABLOCK
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "Analog Block Under Test."

ioreg_bitfield.name: ANASIG
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "Analog Block signal."

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: PORDLY3
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield controls the Power On Sequence Delay 2."

ioreg_bitfield.name: PORDLY2
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield controls the Power On Sequence Delay 2."

ioreg_bitfield.name: PORDLY1
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield controls the Power On Sequence Delay 1."

ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: CVRGHSN

ioreg_bitfield.name: PWRSEQ1SWE
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "Analog Power sequence signals software override enable."

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: LDOVREFSEL
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "Select to the ALDO and CLDO to use uncalibrated (0) or calibrated (1) voltage reference".

ioreg_bitfield.name: PWRSEQ2SWE
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "Analog Power sequence signals software override enable."

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: PWDCMPP18HP

ioreg_bitfield.name: PWRSEQ3SWE
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "Analog Power sequence signals software override enable."

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: BODLRDE
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "Disable 1.8V Brown-out reset."

ioreg.ioreg_intro: This register determines whether the bootloader code is visible at address 0x00000000

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: BOOTLOADERLOW
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit determines whether the bootloader code is visible at address 0x00000000 or not."

ioreg.ioreg_intro: Register to indicate whether the shadow registers are valid

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: SHADOWVALID
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit indicates whether the shadow registers contain valid data from the Flash Information Space."

ioreg.ioreg_intro: Register to capture the address on the ICODE bus observed which causes a bus fault

ioreg_bitfield.name: ICODEFAULTADDR
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This field contains the ICODE bus address observed when a Bus Fault occurred. Once an address is captured in this field, it is held until the corresponding Fault Observed bit is cleared in the FAULTSTATUS register."

ioreg.ioreg_intro: Register to capture the address on the DCODE bus observed which causes a bus fault

ioreg_bitfield.name: DCODEFAULTADDR
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This field contains the DCODE bus address observed when a Bus Fault occurred. Once an address is captured in this field, it is held until the corresponding Fault Observed bit is cleared in the FAULTSTATUS register."

ioreg.ioreg_intro: Register to capture the address on the SYS bus observed which causes a bus fault

ioreg_bitfield.name: SYSFAULTADDR
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This field contains the SYS bus address observed when a Bus Fault occurred. Once an address is captured in this field, it is held until the corresponding Fault Observed bit is cleared in the FAULTSTATUS register."

ioreg.ioreg_intro: Register to reflect the status of the bus decoders' fault detection.

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: SYSFAULT
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "The SYS Bus Decoder Fault Detected bit. When '1', a fault has been detected, and the SYSFAULTADDR register will contain the bus address which generated the fault. A write to this register will clear all of the status bits."

ioreg_bitfield.name: DCODEFAULT
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "The DCODE Bus Decoder Fault Detected bit. When '1', a fault has been detected, and the DCODEFAULTADDR register will contain the bus address which generated the fault. A write to this register will clear all of the status bits."

ioreg_bitfield.name: ICODEFAULT
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "The ICODE Bus Decoder Fault Detected bit. When '1', a fault has been detected, and the ICODEFAULTADDR register will contain the bus address which generated the fault. A write to this register will clear all of the status bits."

ioreg.ioreg_intro: Register to enable the fault capture registers

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: FAULTCAPTUREEN
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit enables (1) or disables (0) the fault capture mechanism."

ioreg.ioreg_intro: Key Register for SRAM POWER CONTROL

ioreg_bitfield.name: VALUE
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: Key value. (0x19 unlocks)

ioreg.ioreg_intro: Key Register for FLASH POWER CONTROL

ioreg_bitfield.name: VALUE
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: Key value. (0xd3 unlocks)

ioreg.ioreg_intro: Key Register for Ambiq Internal Settings (mfg test, trims)

ioreg_bitfield.name: VALUE
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: Key value. (0x73 unlocks)

ioreg.ioreg_intro: Control bit to enable/disable the PMU

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: PMUENABLE
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit selectively enables (1) or disables (0) the Power Management unit of the MCU."

ioreg_bitfield.name: RSVD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bitfield is reserved for future use."

ioreg_bitfield.name: FABD
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit reflects the state of the chip's FA_BD control."

ioreg_bitfield.name: SRAMWIPED
ioreg_bitfield.ioreg_bf_description: "This bit indicates that the SRAM was forced to power-off when a debugger was attached."
